amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, additional funding for missile defense testing and operations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4471 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 185.

action.text: Amendment SA 4471 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S6366-6370, S6375, S6377; text as modified: CR S6366) To provide, with an offset, additional funding for missile defense testing and operations.
